subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Olli Jokinen scored the only goal of the shootout and Tomas Vokoun made 28 saves, giving the Florida Panthers a 3-2 victory Friday night against the visiting Rangers.
snippet: Olli Jokinen scored the only goal of the shootout and Tomas Vokoun made 28 saves, giving the Florida Panthers a 3-2 victory Friday night against the visiting Rangers.
